title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4215.9 - When sellers' windows open
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4215.9 - When sellers' windows open

State Regulations

Mutuel sellers' windows shall open at least 30 minutes
before the first race and at least 15 minutes before each other race. Mutuel
cashiers' windows shall open as soon as possible after the "official" notice
has been posted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4215.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
